title: New: Evil Arrows – Romancer
body:
Perfectly formed upbeat pop, it just has to be from Brooklyn, right? **Evil Arrows** appear effortlessly cool on their debut track _Romancer_, a two and a half minute, no frills attached, straight up indie-pop gem.

I’m can’t find too much info on the group at the moment, with only a [Facebook](http://t.co/QRWuPU6wyE) page with two ‘likes’ and a deserted [Twitter](https://twitter.com/evilarrows) profile to their name, but on the strength of Romancer, it’s only a matter of time before they’re gaining more coverage.
